name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: Extra Equipment Set / 装備セット / 裝備禮包
detailed_description:
"Unlock extra equipment with the Extra Equipment Set.

The following items will be added:

Rare Protector Set
・Light Mail
・Flare Gear
・Frost Gear
・Riser Gear
・Impact Gear
・Energy Gear
・Infinite Lodis
・Eternal Lodis
・Sacrifice Stride
・Blast Drive

Rare Attachment Set
・Gain Core
・Climb Gem
・Vital Porter
・Permeate Porter
・Angelous Jail
・Photon Shiner

New Protector Set
・Defense Blueprint Revision
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Development].

New Attachment Set
・Revised Support Equipment Blueprint
lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Development].

New TCS Addition Pack ①
・New TCS [Brunhild]
※TCS for Asahi, Miyako use
※Remodel Lv. will also be carried over

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items. "

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
